Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon can control 100 tons of fallen snow. It plays around innocently by leaping in and out of avalanches it has caused.
Generation IX.Violet: The hatred of those who perished by the sword long ago has clad itself in snow and become a Pokémon.

Generation IX.Scarlet: West Province: Icerend Shrine ( Only one )
Generation IX.Violet: West Province: Icerend Shrine ( Only one )
